title: Alumni Data Management System
problem: Manual tracking of alumni records led to data fragmentation and inefficient communication within the institution.
solution: Engineered a centralized web application using a Flask API and JavaScript to automate database management and alumni networking.
result1: Successfully streamlined data retrieval for 500+ records with a significant reduction in administrative manual entry time.

title: E-Commerce Sales Analitics Dashboard
problem: The business struggled to track real-time profitability and sales trends across different regions, leading to delayed decision-making and inefficient inventory management
solution: Developed an interactive Power BI dashboard using Star Schema and DAX to visualize KPIs like YoY Growth, Profit Margins, and Customer Segmentation with dynamic filtering
result1: Reduced reporting time by 80% and identified high-loss product categories, enabling the management to optimize marketing spend and improve overall profit margins

title: Facebook Ads Campaign Performance Analysis
problem: The marketing team lacked a unified view to track Ad Spend efficiency (ROAS) and CPA across multiple campaigns, making it difficult to identify underperforming ads in real-time.
solution: Built a Power BI dashboard integrating Facebook Ads data to track funnel metrics (Impressions to Conversions) using DAX for custom metrics and Trend Analysis for budget optimization.
result1: Improved Ad Spend efficiency by 25% through better targeting insights and automated the reporting process, saving the team over 10 hours of manual data entry per week.
